パッケージ io.github.townyadvanced.flagwar.util

クラス Messaging

java.lang.Object
io.github.townyadvanced.flagwar.util.Messaging
public final class Messaging extends Object
Handles messaging for FlagWar. Useful for debugging or sending a String to a Player.

  • メソッドの概要

    修飾子とタイプ
    メソッド
    説明
    static void
    debug(@NotNull String debugMessage)
    Send a debugMessage (FW_DEBUG: [String]) over the Logger via Level.WARNING.
    static void
    debug(@NotNull String messageFormat, @NotNull Object... args)
    Send a debugMessage (FW_DEBUG: [String]) over the WARN channel, passing the supplied messageFormat and arguments to a Formatter.
    static void
    send(@NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player recipient, @NotNull String str)
    Sends a simple String to a given Player.

    クラスから継承されたメソッド java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • メソッドの詳細

    • send

      public static void send(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player recipient, @NotNull @NotNull String str)
      Sends a simple String to a given Player.
      パラメータ:
      recipient - Player receiving message.
      str - A simple String.

    • debug

      public static void debug(@NotNull @NotNull String debugMessage)
      Send a debugMessage (FW_DEBUG: [String]) over the Logger via Level.WARNING.

      Must have the extra.debug config node set to true for the message to be sent.

      パラメータ:
      debugMessage - Simple String to pass to the logger.

    • debug

      public static void debug(@NotNull @NotNull String messageFormat, @NotNull @NotNull Object... args)
      Send a debugMessage (FW_DEBUG: [String]) over the WARN channel, passing the supplied messageFormat and arguments to a Formatter.
      パラメータ:
      messageFormat - A String, compatible with Formatter.format(String, Object...).
      args - Arguments to pass to the String for formatting.
